title: Adobe Firefly â€” AI Tool Review
description: Adobe Firefly is Adobe's commercially safe AI image generator, integrated into Photoshop and Illustrator for professional creative workflows. Adobe Firefly is Adobe's family of AI generative models trained on licensed content, making it commercially safe for professional use. It's integrated into Photoshop (Generative Fill), Illustrator, and Premiere Pro, allowing AI image generation within your existing Adobe workflow. Firefly's key differentiator is its commercial licensing clarity for enterprise customers. Highlights: Commercially safe (licensed training data). Native Photoshop and Illustrator integration. Generative Fill for inpainting. Adobe Creative Cloud subscription included. Enterprise-grade support.
